resources.string: A near-perfect balance of sweet, smoky, crusty, and salty, the BLT is what food dreams are made of. If only it were healthy to eat bacon and mayo on a daily basis
It\'s the first meal that most of us learn how to cook at home by ourselves. It\'s salty, gooey, crisp, buttery, and comforting in all the right ways
This wonderful Italian style sandwich is finished off with a drizzling of vinaigrette. Pile it high!
Despite being so simple, the Cuban sandwich is packed full of flavour and all of the flavours work so well together!
A simple creation involving a deep fried potato patty with some coriander and spices. It originated as a street food in Mumbai
Cheesesteak was developed in the early 20th century "by combining frizzled beef, onions, and cheese in a small loaf of bread".
In this shrimp po boy recipe, the paper-thin crust and pillowy crumb of a New Orleans–style French roll is essential as is Crystal hot sauce.
It comes with a combination of mortadella, capicola, and Genoa salami. At a good Italian delicatessen, you'll be able to find the peppers and sliced meats
The art of the meatball sandwich is all about the construction… well, and the meatballs, of course. You can eat them as is
In case you don’t know the strict definition, a patty melt is a beautiful, luscious, delicious cross between a grilled cheese and a hamburger
Skip the fast-food fish sandwiches and make them at home. They're 15-minutes fast and they are much more healthier
It was one of two signature sandwiches created by chefs at the Brown Hotel shortly after its founding in 1923
Also known as Peanut butter, banana and bacon sandwich is very tasty, especially on cold winter days!
The bologna sandwich, fried or unfried, has been elevated to a regional specialty in the Midwest, Appalachia, and the South
This flavorful sandwich will add brightness to even the coldest winter day. Serve it with fresh seasonal citrus or other fruit
Breakfast meets dinner in this play on the Southern favorite. The sauce is full of flavor that blends nicely
Sold all over Paris, from boulangeries to street vendors I thought less of it. But once I tasted it, I became obsessed
The dish is often used as a way to use up leftovers, common additions include chopped ham, veal, chicken, lobster, peas, etc.
But when life gives you massive amounts of excess chicken Parm, then there's only one thing to do: Make Chicken Parm sandwiches
Creamy, controversial foie gras comes together with freezer-aisle steak in this cheesy sandwich
This delicious crab sandwich recipe is great for any outdoor party, day or night
When adding rich ingredients like creme fraiche and caviar, the smaller size also feels less over-indulgent
Innovators prefer a crunchy, tangy and slightly spicy version of the lobster salad that includes celery, lettuce, lemon juice and a pinch of cayenne. Purists don\'t
Each of these mighty sandwiches can be 10 cm tall, filled with about 250gms of hand-shaved pork loin, avocado, celery and plenty of mayonnaise
Invented by Dishoom in England with a perfect anglo-indian style and a proper addition of spicy chutney, cream cheese and coriander
A trimmed down version of a Italian sandwich classic. It is as healthy as it is tasty
The name is based on the verb croquer ("to bite") and the word monsieur ("mister"). It first made appearance in 1910, Paris
A croque monsieur served with a poached or lightly fried egg on top is known as a croque madame
Dated as far back as 1899 it\'s a sandwich of occasionally toasted bread, sliced cooked poultry, fried bacon, lettuce, tomato and mayonnaise
Pastrami a meat product usually made from beef, and sometimes from pork, mutton or turkey
A schnitzel is meat, thinned by pounding with a meat tenderizer, coated with flour, beaten eggs and bread crumbs, and then fried.
The muffuletta is the quintessential New Orleans sandwich of cured meats, cheese and tangy olive salad piled onto a sturdy Italian loaf
With a hunk of crisp, golden sourdough holding everything together, the oily sweetness of smoked eel with fiery horseradish cream and Dijon mustard.
The Reuben sandwich is an hot sandwich composed of corned beef, Swiss cheese, sauerkraut and Thousand Island dressing, grilled between slices of rye bread
A properly fried clam is beautifully bronzed with a light, crisp coating, and it bursts with briny, oceanic flavor when you bite in
Quick-pickled cukes give these burgers tart crunch. Panko and egg white hold the patties together. Use cilantro leaves on the burgers as you would lettuce for herby freshness.
The name of the sandwich comes from the local Provençal language, Nissart, in which pan banhat and the alternative spelling pan bagnat mean "bathed bread"
This sandwich is the best for those who would like to add some spice to their life with some jalapeno, garlic and spice powder
Created by Todd Wilbur in his book "Even More Top Secret Recipes". To make this a little healthier, just broil the sandwiches in the oven
For anyone who loves egg mayo and love spices, this is really a win - win recipe. Tastes better when prepared with toasted wholegrain English muffins
This sandwich is to die for! If you like the ingredients, you\'ll love them together in this sandwich!. Don\'t believe? Try it out now
This veg sandwich is from bombay aka Mumbai. Found anywhere in Mumbai, it is ideal for picnics, school lunch, evening snacks or short eats
The torta ahogada was created accidentally when a torta was dropped into the salsa container. A delicious accident indeed
Bosna is both the name for the sandwich and the sausage in the sandwich. The sausage was originally called Nadanitza
Deviled ham is ground ham with added spices such as hot sauce, cayenne pepper, hot peppers, or mustard. This process is called deviling or spicing up
Pulled Pork - Pork cooked slowly over a low heat until it is tender enough to be pulled into strips, often prepared with a barbecue sauce
The word is derived from bánh (bread) and mì (wheat bread), or more specifically the baguette, was introduced by the French during its colonial period
It was named after Dagwood Bumstead, a central character in the comic strip Blondie, who is frequently illustrated making enormous sandwiches
Tonkatsu, like many things Japanese, runs from low-end comfort food to high-end perfection. You can make it at home or have white gloved waiters bring it to you
Shawarma is a Middle Eastern dish of garlicky meat or poultry served on pitas. This chicken version is flavored with a savory yogurt sauce
Roti is a Hindi, Urdu and Malay for bread, more generally for any bread-based food I have no idea who John is but this is a delicious breakfast or snack
Sliced bread, cheese and cooked ham are very readily available in Western supermarkets and as a result ham and cheese sandwiches are quick and easy to prepare
Hot pepper sauce is the traditional condiment, but we\'ve improvised a little, using chipotle mayonnaise to add a layer of smokiness instead of pure heat
This fun, gooey treat makes a great after-school snack. The marshmallows are slightly charred and the bread is cleverly caramelized for double the toasty flavor
The cookies are oatmeal cookies with chunks of dried cherries, dark chocolate, and pecans. As you can see, this dessert is quite a mouthful
These are best served immediately, so if you\'re planning for dessert, just assemble them in advance and wait until you\'re ready for the sweets to begin pressing
Though there is a common thought that making macrons will make you collapse on your kitchen floor, if you overcome that, you have a new world of taste before you.
For an even faster version of this decadent ice-cream sandwich dessert, substitute your favorite brownie mix
Great for the kids—or the kids at heart—frozen fruit swirled into frozen yogurt and sandwiched between two crisp oatmeal cookies
An ice cream sandwich is a frozen dessert consisting of ice cream between two wafers, cakes, cookies, or other similar biscuit
Yes, it\'s a Nutella and banana sandwich fried in butter. It\'s naughty, but we are allowed an occasional treat sometimes. Just make sure you go for a jog afterwards.
Fruit sandwich are a very popular snack in Japan. These sandwiches are had during tea time in Japan. Mostly loved by women
The term “fluffernutter” was created by an advertising agency in 1960 as a more effective way to market the sandwich
A 2002 survey showed the average American will have eaten 1,500 of these sandwiches before high school graduation
Prosciutto and fresh figs are a classic Italian combination. Along with the cheese and jam, they create a sweet-savory sandwich that's simple yet memorable.
Cinnamon Toast’s golden brown color, crispiness and ability to melt butter gets me every time. Warm and cozy.
Eating a late-night tuna melt in front of a woman is a sure sign you have completely stopped giving a crap. The taste speaks for itself
A crisp sandwich, chip sandwich, chipwich, potato chip sandwich or chippy sandwich is a sandwich that includes crisps as one of the fillings
Pile the noodles into a bun sliced down the middle in the style of a hot dog, and garnish the top with mayonnaise and shreds of pickled ginger
Daniel da Silva invented it in the 1960s when he tried to adapt the croque-monsieur to Portuguese taste. It is a very popular dish in Porto, Portugal.
It\'s a known fact that roasted turkey trumps deli turkey, so now\'s the time to make all your favorite turkey sandwiches
Telera refers to a Mexican bread similar to a French roll with a scored and flour-dusted crust. It can be found in Mexican markets
Sometimes you create a recipe that’s so melt in your mouth – savor every meaty, cheesy bite – delicious. This is one of them
Porchetta is the body of a whole pig that’s been deboned, stuffed and roasted. It’s a popular dish from the Lazio region of Italy
Need a hearty, flavorful dinner? Why not whip up this scrumptious Spicy Chicken Breakfast biscuit?! Breakfast for dinner is the best!
Meatloaf is a lot like Thanksgiving turkey, it’s almost always better the day after. At least when sandwiched between two slices of bread.
The Cemita is what happens when a pulled pork sandwich spends Spring Break south of the border. This sandwich, a fan favorite in Puebla, Mexico
Falafel is a deep fried ball or patty made from ground chickpeas, fava beans or both. It is commonly served in a pita, which acts as a pocket.
You will be charmed by their incredibly over sized warm capicola sandwich stuffed with French fries and coleslaw
Here's a tasty way to use up leftover roast chicken. Dark meat stands up to the intense flavors in the dressing
Italian Beef is made by slowly roasting lean beef on a rack above a pan filled with seasoned beef-based stock
Make the sauce ahead of time, if you like. Just reheat it and toast the buns to finish the sliders
Gatsbys originated in Cape Town, where people would often buy large rolls and fill them with whatever leftovers they had for lunch the next day
The fresh flavors in this Grilled Zucchini Caprese Sandwich recipe will leave you wanting more
Pack sandwich components separately the leaves and the cheese; a mixture of the dressing and pepper; and the toasted bagel
If you like pimiento cheese, you'll enjoy this recipe. Keep the sandwiches well chilled so the cream cheese spread will remain firm
Feta cheese, popularly used in mediterranean cuisine, has a slightly salty taste that goes well with the tomatoes and basil
Crusty Cuban bread is perfectly complemented with creamy mozzarella and a slice of juicy tomato. Serve with sweet potato chips or a simple green salad
These flavorful wraps are filled with good-for-you ingredients like hummus and fresh vegetables. They're perfect for a quick lunch or dinner
Here's the key to a speedy dinner: While the eggplant broils, toast your bread slices in a toaster oven.
These bite-size Beet and Brown Rice Sliders will leave you satisfied and craving another. Good news: a serving size of these veggie burgers is two sliders
The stack of grilled eggplant, red onion, and zucchini are quite a mouthful but still tasty to eat.
Good old toast and sandwiches never let you down. Try this and you are bound to love it. It is so simple and delicious
The whole point about cucumber sandwiches is that, unless done really well, they're as dull as the sum of their ingredients
This popular breakfast food is also a late night favorite after a good "lime." "Lime" is the Trini term for "hanging out"
Two favorite Italian foods, spaghetti and garlic bread, come together in this recipe which the whole family will love
Spinach is a natural with a grilled cheese. Plus, thanks to all of those Popeye cartoons when you were a kid, it makes you feel extra healthy
Tasty and light, grilling gives the vegetables nice smoky taste. A little bit garlic and lemon juice brighten up the mayonnaise
Mushrooms are an exceptionally nutrient-dense food, with one serve offering a surprising amount and array of essential nutrients
A vegetarian (but trust me meat lovers, the meat is NOT missed in this one) packed wrap filled fresh veggies and a southwestern black-bean hummus
Mushrooms (especially portabellas!) are often used as a substitute for meat, not just for their texture, but for their umami (savory) flavor
